common.home: Khanh Ha Khung Nhung ma JP

sourcing.des: IDS (Intelligent Direct Sourcing) was founded with the goal of making a connection between worldwide B2B clients and manufacturers in Vietnam to achieve the greatest standards of quality, turnaround time and values.

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.des1: Our aim is to make the development in sourcing of goods and the purchase process straightforward and efficient, we always strive to handle the demand of locating sources and acquiring a diversity of goods from foreign partners, while also accompanying Vietnamese manufacturers to utilize the positive aspects and potentials of Vietnamese commodity elites.
aboutUs.des2: Vietnam, which is a country with a strong institutional foundation, lots of resources as well as reasonable prices, has been actively integrating into the global economy through a broad system of FTAs.
aboutUs.des3: In the current advantageous macro-environment, IDS's goal is to assist international purchasing units with transparency and systematizing purchase plans in order to achieve optimal efficiency.

ourJourney.title: Our Journey
ourJourney.des1: Our journey commenced in 2018 with the ultimate goal of enabling international buyers to implement their procurement plans sucessfully, especially managing the process of finding and selecting competent vendors in Vietnam. We aim at "sourcing made easy and effective" that entails  identifying the clients' project requirements to closing the contract with manufacturers. With a team having both the foresight and the willingness to learn, IDS has been constantly expanding its network across Vietnam, currently known as the world new sourcing hub.
ourJourney.des2: Currently, IDS has not only its headquarters located in VietNam, Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang city, but also two offices in Australia, Melbourne and Sydney . We are confident that we can support international partners, especially those in North America and Australia, accessing the supply service easily, efficiently, and quickly.
ourJourney.des3: IDS has established and consolidated relationships with hundreds of factories producing a wide range of goods after one year of operation, such as 5B - Solar Reinvented, VBP Interior, Aldi Supermarket, Austdoor Group JSC, Watt EV. Thanks to the goal of diversifying our services, we have thrived and carefully examined Vietnam's supply industry.

mission.title: Mission
mission.des: IDS is a bridge that creates value for the possibility of developing international enterprises and businesses in Vietnam. We provide the greatest service experience to B2B clients (Business to Business) with the criterion "Quality - Speed - Value”.

quote.des: When you think of product sourcing made easy, think of us!

coreValue.title: Core Values
coreValue.desCore3: Value is created by speed control.
coreValue.desCore4: Upgrade the standard day by day.

whyIds.title: Why IDS?
whyIds.des1: Intensive network with Vietnam leading manufacturers
whyIds.des2: In depth understanding of products and Vietnam business manner
whyIds.des3: Professional assistance to all buyer's visit

ourProjects.title: Our Projects
ourProjects.des: IDS always wants to be a companion in order to achieve collaborative experiences that create the existent value.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.des1: IDS has a group of knowledgeable experts that enable us to offer each client the suitable services they need. Strong human resources who are eager to learn and always follow the core value “Trustworthiness - Integrity - Speed - Innovation - Creativity” is the background to serve clients.
ourTeam.des2: IDS connects to the source of product supply easily.
ourTeam.desPos1: Market volatility causes significant challenges to procurement, we are here to help you master the game.
ourTeam.desPos2: A strong desire to flourish, the connection creates value and being willing to learn are the basis which links IDS's clients to the development of the firm.
ourTeam.desPos3: We work for you as an extension of your business in helping you thrive sustainably.
ourTeam.desPos4: With valuable expertise to many high-profile clients, IDS team will drive your business’s growth and strengthen its success.

clientSays.title: What do our clients say?
clientSays.des: It has been a privilege working with Joe and Kenny, especially when the Covid-19 pandemic took a heavy toll on all businesses worldwide. IDS helped us to pull up a miracle: 60 containers of goods delivered successfully within 5 totally-working-online months from scratch
clientSays.name: Matthew Vocale
